sentences.english: Glassmaking at this time was almost entirely utilitarian.
sentences.chinese: 這時，製作玻璃用品幾乎全都是爲了獲取實利。

sentences.english: For the first time he realized that eating was something more than a utilitarian function.
sentences.chinese: 他第一次意識到喫飯原來還不僅具有實利的功能。

sentences.english: There is also a snobbishness is in with a small advantage.
sentences.chinese: 還有一種勢利是小氣中帶着實利。
“有錢人是很實利的，”我鄙夷的說。

sentences.english: He embodied the American spirit of optimistic materialism.
sentences.chinese: 他體現了美國人樂觀的實利主義精神。

sentences.english: From the utilitarian point of view, every pan of the flower is utilized.
sentences.chinese: 由實利主義的觀點上看起來，蓮花的各部分都有用處。

sentences.english: This advantage of local women, Tai Shi public write lovely simple.
sentences.chinese: 這種實利的鄉土女性，太史公寫得素樸可愛。
